rows.label: qev092206_MSG0001
rows.name:
I know how important building FrontierNet is.
Of COURSE I do![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092206_MSG0002
rows.name:
But days of overtime in a row, never-ending quotas[ST:wide ]—!
I'm already at my limit![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092206_MSG0003
rows.name:
The only one who can save me from this suffering
is the Holy Mother of NLA[ST:wide ]—! Himeri-san![ST:wait ]
